nodes.text: Mandalah III was a planet in the Mandalah system.

Mandalah III was considered one of the most misreputed planets in the galaxy. This world had been ransacked by centuries of intensive mining. At the time of the Galactic Civil War, it was under the control of the Galactic Empire.
The planet Mandalah III has only appeared in the French RPG magazine Casus Belli HS6.
